name: Wushu Legacy
description: You're Akakin, a scout in the service of his kingdom during the China's warring states period. War ravages the country, your duty is to end it! Sneak behind enemy lines and make a path through the general's army to take his head. In this rhythmic runner, pass through the Tào Shù valley and discover the beautiful environment while defeating enemies at the beat of the music. Test your skills, challenge your friends and try to enter the legend with the online leaderboard. What are you waiting for ? It's time to fight !
